name: Bulgarian Tarator - Cold Cucumber Soup
author: muka3D
summary: This is an extremely popular summertime dish in Bulgaria. It serves as a replacement for salad or appetizers. It tastes similar to tzatziki, so it's a very bright-flavored, cooling, and refreshing dish!
ingredients: 2  cucumbers, peeled and cut into small cubes
directions: Place cucumbers in a large bowl
Whisk yogurt in a separate bowl using a fork until yogurt is smooth and liquefied; pour over cucumbers
Add dill, garlic, oil, and salt to cucumber mixture; toss to coat
Stir in enough water to reach desired consistency
Refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes
Ladle soup into serving bowls; add about 2 ice cubes to each bowl
